entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lac-Saint-Jean
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Roberval Airport 02:23 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 40.2 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -5.1°C
Wind: WSW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
